name: POST_templates-template_id-versions
description: **This endpoint allows you to create a new version of a template.**

on-behalf-of.default: The subuser's username. This header generates the API call as if the subuser account was making the call.

active.description: Set the version as the active version associated with the template (0 is inactive, 1 is active). Only one version of a template can be active. The first version created for a template will automatically be set to Active.

editor.description: The editor used in the UI.

generate_plain_content.description: If true, plain_content is always generated from html_content. If false, plain_content is not altered.

html_content.description: The HTML content of the version. Maximum of 1048576 bytes allowed.

name.description: Name of the transactional template version.

plain_content.description: Text/plain content of the transactional template version. Maximum of 1048576 bytes allowed.

subject.description: Subject of the new transactional template version.

test_data.description: For dynamic templates only, the mock json data that will be used for template preview and test sends.

$ul: **active**: Set the version as the active version associated with the template. Only one version of a template can be active. The first version created for a template will automatically be set to Active.
**editor**: The editor used in the UI.
**generate_plain_content**: If true, plain_content is always generated from html_content. If false, plain_content is not altered. (default: true)
**html_content**: The HTML content of the version. Maximum of 1048576 bytes allowed.
**name**: Name of the transactional template version.
**plain_content**: Text/plain content of the transactional template version. Maximum of 1048576 bytes allowed. (default: <generated from html_content if left empty>)
**subject**: Subject of the new transactional template version.
**test_data**: For dynamic templates only, the mock json data that will be used for template preview and test sends.
**id**: ID of the transactional template version.
**thumbnail_url**: A Thumbnail preview of the template's html content.
**updated_at**: The date and time that this transactional template version was updated.
